price: 83. Mpe bandimaki na Mûssa te sé lisanga moko ya bilenge ya bato ya falo mpo été bazalaki kobanga falo mpe bankumu ya pembeni naye, noki basala bango mabe. Kasi ya soló, falo amitombolaki o kati ya mokili, mpe azalaki o kati ya balekisi ndelo.
arabic: فَمَآ ءَامَنَ لِمُوسَىٰٓ إِلَّا ذُرِّيَّةٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ عَلَىٰ خَوۡفٖ مِّن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِمۡ أَن يَفۡتِنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لَعَالٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: famā āmana limūsā illā dhurriyyatun min qawmihi ʿalā khawfin min fir'ʿawna wamala-ihim an yaftinahum wa-inna fir'ʿawna laʿālin fī al-arḍi wa-innahu lamina al-mus'rifīna
